entry.title: 14"x108" Dusty Rose Satin Embroidered Sheer Organza Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 3.39 - 643.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Runner
Material: Organza with Satin
Color: Dusty Rose
Size: 14" x 108" including 3" Satin Borders
Edges: Serged
How To Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, Don't use a dryer.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

ONE-OF-A-KIND Leaf-Motif Embroidered Organza With Satin Table Runner

Add a dash of elegant sophistication into your wedding and banquet tables with these delicately fashioned see-thru organza runners accented with the standout nature of satin and stunning leaf-motif embroidery. Let this avant-garde design impart a swanky touch to your table decor, outshining your event and celebration. Bring the best out of your table cloths by adorning them with these chic runners that combine the delicacy of sheer organza fabric with the modern flair of satin Leaf-Motif embroidery and glossy sheen of silky satin borders.

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Table Runner
  • Material: Organza With Satin
  • Color: Dusty Rose
  • Size: 14" x 108" including 3" satin borders
  • How to Care: Hand wash only. Hang dry, don't use dryer.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration
    Save

entry.title: 12"x108" Dusty Sage Satin Table Runner
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230
Type: Runners
Price: 0.99 - 276.21 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Table Runner
Material: Satin
Color: Dusty Sage
Size: 12" W x 108" L
Seamless, 1 pc design. Edges are serged.
Works beautifully with our tablecloths.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


[Information]

Silky Smooth Satin Table Runners

Silky, smooth, and shiny satin always inspires people; there is an overwhelming charm and sophistication that this imperial fabric exudes. This attribute makes it a number one choice for decoration, embellishing and ornamenting. Our supreme quality Satin Table Runners are fashioned with sublime refinement and extra smoothness to create one of a kind table decor accents for those special events that call for an extra dash of swanky urbanity and a red carpet treatment.

Royal Look & Effect

Spread these shimmering sheets atop your drab tables and plain table linens to create a perfect celebratory mood that will leave your guests in a complete awe of such a festal decoration. Oozing royal feel and luster, our Satin Table Runners are ideal to give your plain tables and tablecloths a quick glamorous twist. Elevate the elegance of your tables manifold at wedding, birthday, holiday dinner, Christmas feast, and special events  by draping with these lush spreads.

     

Premium Quality

Dress your tables to the nines with our durable, reusable and totally adorable Satin Table Runners that will give your guests an instant esteemed feel and royal treatment during your event. Fashioned from premium quality silky satin, these Runners can be used again and again to spruce your tables up without losing their regal luster and seamless sheen.

Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Machine washable with Cold water
  • For table runner only, table covers and other decorations are sold separately.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

Linen Care Instructions

entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2230

[About]

Quantity: 1 Runner
Material: High quality satin crafted into numerous side by side roses
Color: Light Blue
Dimensions: 14" wide x 108" long
Works beautifully with our tablecloth
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.


[Information]

Add oodles of flair and character in your party with our enticing raised rosette table runner, which is simply breathtaking. The very sight of this floral ecstasy will bring the divine vision of a paradise garden with its whimsical blossoms and luster into your event/celebration. For those special and rare celebrations that need to have an extra doting touch in their ambiance decoration, this top-notch rosette linen is a picture perfect choice. The lustrous texture and hue of these satin roses symbolize glee, feat, and an aspiration to achieve even bigger dreams. Showcase your triumphant jubilancy to the world with this festive piece of art. This premium quality fabric is made by crafting large satin side by side roses to attain a true fantasy feel and texture. Add a personal touch to your decorations with our amazing raised large roses accented table runners available in an exciting range of colors and sizes. Swag or drape it atop your party or banquet tables to attain that perfect posh look and feel.

Additional Information:

    • How To Care: Machine washable with Cold water
    • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration

    Linen Care Instructions
